original_text: All this trouble happened to Jerusalem and to Judah because the Lord was very angry with them. In the end, the Lord sent them away from himself. This is what happened when King Zedekiah turned against the king of Babylon.
korean_text: 여호와께서 예루살렘과 유다에게 진노하심이 그들을 자기 앞에서 쫓아내시기까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: All this trouble happened to Jerusalem
because the Lord was very angry with them
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주께서 그들에게 매우 진노하셨기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: the Lord sent them away from himself
when King Zedekiah turned against the king of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 시드기야 왕이 바빌론 왕을 배반했을 때
